page.title: 18POLLUTION
page.content: Pollution has always been a major issue in this area.The heavy industries have done a great deal to improve their pollution control.Most of the area is a smokeless zone.The environmental health officer visits our school,St. Mary's Junior in Grangetown because the school has sample collection apparatus installed in the building.The officer comes on a Friday morning to collect the sample bottles and replace them with new ones.The apparatus is stored in the P.E. store room,there is a pipe which goes through the wall to the outside to collect the air samples.The officer takes the samples for analysis to The Environmental Health Offices.
